inclusion.criterion: patients suffering from infrarenal abdominal aortic aneurysm undergoing endovascular
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Leukocytosis (white blood cell count [WBC]> 10,000 / mL) and elevated body temperature
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Pregnant woman with fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, dysuria, urgency, frequency, and flank pain. Urine culture shows Gram-negative rod-shaped bacterial cells, leukocytes, and leukocyte casts.
